name: LOST (itch) (煌瞳小妖/MitoGame)
description:
Left and Right arrow to play, and always use them

Find the door and press W, incase you misunderstood the intro

First time tried to solo in a 48 hours game jam, and I had only 24 hours... So there aren't many levels, because I really don't have time. But I think the final level is challenging still, hope you'll enjoy it.

Also thanks for the music from freesound.org,

I really need some sleep now...(¦3ꇤ[▓▓▓]

-------------------

Finally I have little time to add some details about some hints to make the game less confusing : ) Thanks for all the previous feedbacks
